sentence: I mean, what does it what do (CROSSTALK) Rep. Peter Meijer: Yes, to clarify, when asked about whether why there was the reversion back after January 6 to supporting Donald Trump, I said because individuals did not see an alternative, they did not see another path, not that there is no choice, but that we need to be creating the path.
title: Death threats, primary challenge followed Rep. Meijer's vote to impeach Trump after Jan. 6
